events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 10, involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the keywords in the initial report, confirming involvement of a car collision.
An experienced auto insurance claim agent was assigned to manage and follow up on the claim for faster resolution.
Official acknowledgment of the claim has been sent to the customer, confirming receipt and initiation of the claims process.
The agent requested additional documents including the police report, vehicle damage photos, and the other driver’s insurance details.
Customer provided all requested documents, including detailed photos of the car damage and the official police accident report.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence and interviewed witnesses to determine fault and validate the claim.
The investigation concluded that the customer’s vehicle was hit while legally stopped, confirming the other party was at fault.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs and a rental car during the repair period was proposed to the customer.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and agreed to proceed with the repair plan immediately.
Official claim approval was granted after confirmation of the settlement terms and final verification of all submitted documents.
Payment for the vehicle repairs and rental coverage was disbursed to the customer’s account as per the approved claim.
The claim has been officially closed after all repairs were completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the outcomes.
Final documentation and communications were archived, closing the file for any future reference related to the vehicle accident claim.
